title: How-To Guide: Using Daily AI Advice

content.text: Daily AI Advice provides personalised insights on your portfolio, trading behaviour, and opportunities for improvement. It refreshes every day at exactly 11:00 AM based on your latest trades, risk settings, and market conditions.

content.title: What Daily Advice Helps You With
items: Understanding strengths and weaknesses in your portfolio
Spotting diversification gaps and sector risks
Improving your entry and exit timing
Identifying behavioural patterns such as over-concentration or emotional trading
Receiving stock and option recommendations tailored to your settings

content.text: Nyra AI evaluates all your trading activity and portfolio data each morning before generating your 11:00 AM update.

content.title: What Nyra Analyzes
items: Your current holdings, cash, and sector exposure
Recent trades and order types (market vs limit)
Performance metrics such as P/L, timing, and consistency
Risk exposure, drawdown behaviour, and portfolio concentration
Your scenario attempts and post-run trading patterns

content.text: If you make new trades during the day, they will be reflected in the next day's 11:00 AM advice update.
You can control the style and strictness of Nyra’s advice using the AI Preferences panel in Settings.

content.title: Risk Tolerance Options
items: Low — Nyra prioritises capital preservation, safer picks, and conservative strategies.
Moderate — Balanced suggestions with steady growth and controlled risk.
High — More aggressive recommendations focused on higher potential returns.

content.title: AI Tone Options
items: Professional — Clear, objective guidance.
Friendly — Softer tone with encouraging feedback.
Strict — Direct, performance-driven feedback.
Educational — Explanations and teaching-style insights.

content.text: Your AI preferences directly influence the wording, strictness, and risk profile of your daily advice.
All advice is available under the AI Advice tab, where you can switch between Stocks and Options insights.

content.title: What You Will See
items: Portfolio critique (strengths and weaknesses)
Scenario analysis outcomes
Stock diversification recommendations
Option strategy suggestions
Behavioural notes and improvement areas

content.text: Each card is updated at 11:00 AM daily and displays the exact timestamp of your latest update.

items: Daily AI Advice is refreshed every day at 11:00 AM.
